main event: A woman reported a pulsating light in the sky observed by her son and four other youths on the night of 13 February 1965 in Costa Mesa, California.
interesting points: The light changed color from red to green to white and back again., The light was described as approximately the size of a nickel at arm's length., Witnesses reported the light moved rapidly and then hovered., The light emitted a beam that shone directly in the witnesses' faces., The husband of the witness is a Navy enlisted man who advised her to contact authorities.
sighted object: pulsating light changing colors in the sky
witness description: A woman reported along with her son and four other youths.
